summary: Stability patch with 4 fixes tested. ALL 4 FIXES VERIFIED WORKING via Playwright and browser verification.

minor.issue: Returns 403 for test resident - expected role permission behavior
Returns 404 'Condominio no encontrado' - test user's condominium not configured
Returns 404 'Condominio no encontrado' - same condominium config issue

critical_code_review_comments: FIX 1 VERIFIED: ResidentHome.jsx uses useMotionValue(0) with animate() for carousel. Swipe gestures tested and carousel moves between modules (Emergency → Visits → Reservations)

FIX 2 VERIFIED: TanStack Query cache persisting to localStorage with key GENTURIX_QUERY_CACHE (6384 bytes). Keys include: resident.authorizations, resident.areas, resident.reservations, resident.directory, profile.own. maxAge set to 7 days in App.js

FIX 3 VERIFIED: Service Worker v15 activated with API cache genturix-api-cache-v15 containing 3 cached API endpoints (/api/authorizations/my, /api/profile/directory/condominium, /api/profile). StaleWhileRevalidate with 24h expiry working
FIX 4 VERIFIED: PWA icons regenerated at 85% visual size. All manifest icons present (72x72 to 512x512). Files updated at 09:53 Feb 28 2026
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 4 stability fixes verified: (1) Carousel swipe uses useMotionValue for interactive drag - tested via Playwright mouse drag gestures, (2) TanStack Query cache persists to localStorage as GENTURIX_QUERY_CACHE with 7-day maxAge, (3) Service Worker v15 caches API GET requests in genturix-api-cache-v15 with 24h expiry, (4) PWA icons regenerated at 85% canvas size. Minor 404s on /api/resident/reservations and /api/resident/areas are due to test user's condominium not being fully configured - not blocking issues.

fix_1_carousel_swipe.description: Carousel drag follows finger using useMotionValue
fix_1_carousel_swipe.implementation: useMotionValue(0) + animate() with dragConstraints using pixel values
fix_1_carousel_swipe.result: PASS - Swipe gestures tested: Emergency → Visits → Reservations navigation working
fix_1_carousel_swipe.evidence: Screenshots 07-10 show module transitions on swipe

fix_2_cache_persistence.description: TanStack Query cache persists for 7 days in localStorage
fix_2_cache_persistence.result: PASS - Cache found in localStorage key GENTURIX_QUERY_CACHE, 6384 bytes, buster v2

fix_3_service_worker_api_cache.description: Service Worker caches API GET requests with StaleWhileRevalidate
fix_3_service_worker_api_cache.implementation: API_CACHE_NAME genturix-api-cache-v15 with 24h expiry, CACHEABLE_API_PATTERNS for /api/profile, /api/notifications, etc.
fix_3_service_worker_api_cache.result: PASS - SW activated, API cache contains 3 entries

fix_4_pwa_icons.description: PWA icons regenerated at 85% canvas size
fix_4_pwa_icons.result: PASS - All icons present (72x72 to 512x512), files regenerated at 09:53 Feb 28 2026
